rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0001
rows.name:
So we're inside Iira's
Divine Beast, huh...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0002
rows.name:
This is where that epic battle
took place 500 years ago, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0003
rows.name: Yes, indeed...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0004
rows.name:
Man, I really wish
I could've been part of that battle.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0005
rows.name:
Hey, you've lost your memories,
so maybe you actually were there?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, since you lost your memories,
perhaps you really were there?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0007
rows.name:
It's just that you've
lost your memories.
Perhaps you did take part in it?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0008
rows.name:
Ya just don't remember,
but ya might've been there, ya know?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0009
rows.name:
Now that you mention it,
that's such a thrilling possibility!

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0010
rows.name: Hey! Hikari, do you remember?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0012
rows.name:
I kind of remember her being there,
but also kind of don't...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0013
rows.name:
That's so vague!
Which one is it?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0015
rows.name:
I don't remember in detail
who was there 500 years ago.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0016
rows.name: ...Tch, that's disappointing.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0017
rows.name:
Don't look so down.
But hey, if Yaegiri had been there...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0018
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0019
rows.name:
I wonder if you'd have
fought against Hikari?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0020
rows.name:
I wonder if you'd have
 been allies with Hikari?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0021
rows.name:
Perk up, Yaegiri. Say you
were here though...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0022
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0023
rows.name: Would you have fought against Hikari?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0024
rows.name: Would you have been Hikari's ally?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0025
rows.name:
Don't look so despondent, Yaegiri.
If you had been here...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0026
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0027
rows.name: Would you have battled Hikari?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0028
rows.name: Would you have been Hikari's ally?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0029
rows.name:
Perk up, Yaegiri. Hey, if you did fight
here...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0030
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0031
rows.name: Would you have fought against Hikari?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0032
rows.name: Would you have been Hikari's mate?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0101
rows.name:
Exactly!
It couldn't have been any other way!

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0102
rows.name:
We would have given it our all,
fighting an intense battle
against each other!

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0103
rows.name:
I've always strived to become
the strongest Blade, no matter what...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0104
rows.name:
So that means Hikari would have been
my perfect opponent!

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0105
rows.name: What do you think, Hikari?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0106
rows.name: What's your take on this, Hikari?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0107
rows.name: Is that right, Hikari?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0108
rows.name: That right, Hikari?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0109
rows.name: Well...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0110
rows.name:
I think I'd remember
fighting someone like Yaegiri,
so...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0111
rows.name: She probably wasn't there back then.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0112
rows.name:
Or even if she was there,
I might have just let someone
else handle her?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0201
rows.name: An ally? Of Hikari's?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0202
rows.name:
Hmm, I see.
That's not entirely impossible,
I suppose.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0203
rows.name: ...No, that's not possible!

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0204
rows.name: What makes you so sure?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0205
rows.name:
I'm a Blade whose goal is to be
the strongest in all of Alst, remember?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0206
rows.name:
Regardless of Alst's situation,
I definitely would have challenged
Hikari to a fight!

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0207
rows.name:
This was during a war.
Such personal motives
wouldn't have mattered, would they?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0208
rows.name: No! I only have one reason to fight!

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0209
rows.name:
Whoever my Driver might be,
that will never change...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0210
rows.name:
In any era, I'll always fight
in pursuit of strong opponents!

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0211
rows.name:
...What an absurd reason.
But it's just like you, Yaegiri.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0212
rows.name:
That just shows how much
you respect Hikari's strength,
doesn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0213
rows.name:
At least she can recognize
your strength, eh, Hikari?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0214
rows.name:
At the very least, your strength
is being recognized, Hikari.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0215
rows.name:
At least she knows who's
the strongest, yeah, Hikari?

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0216
rows.name: Haha, yeah, that does feel pretty good.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0217
rows.name:
With that kind of determination,
you'll definitely claim the
title of strongest one day.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0301
rows.name:
Hmm, based on her response,
she's not likely to
fight me anytime soon.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0302
rows.name:
I'm saying even a practice
match would be fine,
but...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0303
rows.name: She always just dismisses me.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0304
rows.name:
Indeed,
Hikari doesn't seem to want to fight.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0305
rows.name:
Yeah, Hikari's not really looking like
she's in the mood...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0306
rows.name:
Hikari certainly doesn't appear
to be in a fighting mood.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0307
rows.name:
Ha, yeah, Hikari doesn't seem to be
very much into fightin' now...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0308
rows.name: Oh well, I can accept that for now!

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0309
rows.name:
I'm still in the middle of
my own training journey anyway.

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0310
rows.name:
I'll keep fighting all kinds of
opponents alongside my Driver,
gaining more experience...

rows.label: kizunatalk076_msg0311
rows.name:
One day I'll prove
I can surpass Hikari!
